alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Caldwell; De Witt; Fayette; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Karnes; Lavaca; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 6:39AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Caldwell, central DeWitt, southeastern Guadalupe, northeastern Karnes, southeastern Bastrop, Gonzales, southern Fayette, northwestern Lavaca and northeastern Wilson Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 638 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rosanky to near Palmeto State Park to near Pandora. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Luling, Schulenburg, Shiner, Stockdale, Flatonia, Moulton, Nixon, Waelder, Smiley, Cheapside, Hochheim, Palmeto State Park, Rosanky, Pandora, Gillett, Muldoon, Cistern, Westhoff, and Upton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bastrop; Caldwell; De Witt; Fayette; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Karnes; Lavaca; Wilson
